short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Controller for Nodemcu,Esp8266,Aduino and Raspberry pi

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Arduino Iot Controller ease the way iot devices (Arduino , Nodemcu , Esp8266, Raspberry pi) are connected and controlled.
This extension provides a click through data transfer to Nodemcu ,Arduino ,Esp8266,Raspberry pi like micro controllers. Using this extension has following advantages:
1) Reduce Development Time
2) No Server Cost
3) Cross Platform 
4) Data Transmission 
5) Minimal Delay 
This is free version in which user can create maximum of 5 controllers.
